languages.text: "Я не смею думать о Вашей Светлости — это было бы непростительной дерзостью. Мой долг — служить, а не оценивать".
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
languages.original_text: "Я не смею думать о Вашей Светлости — это было бы непростительной дерзостью. Мой долг — служить, а не оценивать".

traits.locale_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
"I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."

languages.text: "Ich würde mir niemals eine Meinung über Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bilden ... das wäre eine unverzeihliche Schamlosigkeit. Meine Pflicht ist es zu dienen, nicht, zu bewerten."
languages.original_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde mir niemals eine Meinung über Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bilden ... das wäre eine unverzeihliche Schamlosigkeit. Meine Pflicht ist es zu dienen, nicht, zu bewerten."

languages.text: « Jamais je n'oserais vous juger, Votre Seigneurie, ce serait tout à fait déplacé de ma part. Mon devoir est de vous servir, et non pas de vous mettre à l'épreuve. »
languages.original_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais je n'oserais vous juger, Votre Seigneurie, ce serait tout à fait déplacé de ma part. Mon devoir est de vous servir, et non pas de vous mettre à l'épreuve. »

languages.text: «No osaría forjarme una opinión sobre usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}; sería una insolencia por mi parte. Mi deber es servir, no juzgar».
languages.original_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."

traits.locale_text: «No osaría forjarme una opinión sobre usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}; sería una insolencia por mi parte. Mi deber es servir, no juzgar».

languages.text: 「私は陛下について自分の意見を述べようとは思いません。そんなことは私にとって、度し難いほどに恥知らずなことです。私の義務は奉仕であり、評価ではありません」
languages.original_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."

traits.locale_text: 「私は陛下について自分の意見を述べようとは思いません。そんなことは私にとって、度し難いほどに恥知らずなことです。私の義務は奉仕であり、評価ではありません」

languages.text: “我不敢对您妄加评论，大人。这种行为实在是太厚颜无耻，不可原谅。我是职责是侍奉，不是品头论足。”
languages.original_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."

traits.locale_text: “我不敢对您妄加评论，大人。这种行为实在是太厚颜无耻，不可原谅。我是职责是侍奉，不是品头论足。”

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hakkında fikre sahip olmak bana düşmez. Bu benim için affedilmez bir küstahlık olurdu. Benim vazifem hizmet etmek, değerlendirme yapmak değil."
languages.original_text: "I would not dare form opinions about Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — that would be unforgivably brazen of me. My duty is to serve, not to evaluate."
